Rodrigo Carvalho.
Live Visuals & Digital Art.
https://linktr.ee/visiophone

text:
CodeCrafted
Generative Design in Branding
(Edited by victionary, 2025)

https://victionary.com/collections/art-design/products/codecrafted?variant=47863337386226

"We live in a fast-paced digital world where algorithms and data are reshaping design. From interactive installations to boundary-pushing print work, the fusion of programming, technology, and design creates visuals that captivate, evolve, and adapt across mediums.

CodeCrafted is your window into the future of branding, where code and creativity merge to build dynamic identities. This book features a rich showcase of brilliant generative design work, and insights from top studios like DIA, Studio Dumber_DEPT®, and LAVA. It also includes essays from generative design pioneer Patrik Hübner and coding expert Tim Rodenbröker, offering deep dives into the field’s creative and technical potential.
Specs: 170 x 235 mm, 304 pp

Format: full colour, soft cover with plastic sleeve
Release date: August 2025
Language: English
ISBN 978-988-76845-5-8"
